setCornerRadius(double) - Method in class codedraw.Image
Defines the radius of the corners of rectangular shapes: Image.drawSquare(double, double, double), Image.fillSquare(double, double, double), Image.drawRectangle(double, double, double, double), Image.fillRectangle(double, double, double, double); Per default it is set to 10 pixel.
